structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: For the purpose of advertising and developing their natural resources, and promoting the general welfare, better business methods and civic conditions, a corporate body, to be known as the chamber of commerce, is authorized in cities of the home rule class.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 200, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741n-1.
